data.quote: Today’s Accomplishments Were Yesterday’s Impossibilities.
data.author: Robert H. Schuller

data.quote: The Only Way To Do Great Work Is To Love What You Do. If You Haven’t Found It Yet, Keep Looking. Don’t Settle.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Things Work Out Best For Those Who Make The Best Of How Things Work Out.
data.author: John Wooden

data.quote: Fake It Until You Make It! Act As If You Had All The Confidence You Require Until It Becomes Your Reality.
data.author: Brian Tracy

data.quote: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
data.author: C.S. Lewis

data.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
data.author: Amelia Earhart

data.quote: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: There is no easy way from the earth to the stars.
data.author: Seneca - Roman speaker, lawyer and writer

data.quote: Victory is not always winning the battle...but rising every time you fall.
data.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

data.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
data.author: J.K. Rowling

data.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
data.author: Earl Nightingale

data.quote: The limits of the possible can only be defined by going beyond them into the impossible.
data.author: Arthur C. Clarke

data.quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
data.author: Les Brown

data.quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
data.author: William Shakespeare

data.quote: You can’t give up! When you give up, you're like everybody else!
data.author: Chris Evert

data.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: There is nothing more powerful in the world than the idea that came in time.
data.author: Victor Hugo

data.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Always keep your eyes open. Keep watching. Because whatever you see can inspire you.
data.author: Grace Coddington

data.quote: You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
data.author: Christopher Columbus
